PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE ARTISTS' REPRESENTATIVES (GST/HST) REGULATIONS by adding the "Société québécoise des auteurs dramatiques inc." to the list of artists' representatives prescribed for the purposes of subsection 177(2) of the Excise Tax Act.
